EmailTemplate.name: Newly Installed Group General Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Newly Installed Group
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Below is a newly implemented group. Please add to the appropriate records and logs.
ALC- Please send the reporting password email, and create general notice letters as necessary.
Monika - Please send group invoices.
System - WGS Group Number – Group Name – State – Region - East Group Size – Partial or Full – Full Funding Type - Effective Date – QE Reporting – WEB COBRA General Notice Requested –
Thank you,
Anthem COBRA Implementation Team
